tool.name: Wombling (Edge Detection)
tool.description: Continuous Wombling for edge detection. Uses magnitude of gradient to detect edges between adjacent cells. Edge segments connect such edges, when the difference of their gradient directions is below given threshold.

param.name: TDIRECTION
param.label: Maximum Angle
param.help: Maximum angular difference as degree between adjacent segment points.

param.name: TNEIGHBOUR
param.label: Minimum Neighbours
param.help: Minimum number of neighbouring potential edge cells with similar direction.
